name: CrystalRun
description:
Is a simple runner-platformer game in retro style. In the game, you take on the role of an astronaut who needs to collect crystals and not be destroyed by a drill.

This is my first game on love2d and and it's not finished yet ,so don't judge too harshly . I'll be happy to hear your feedback and advice.

Movement - A and D or Arrows,

Jump - Space or W

Special thanks to MattWalkden for the texture pack!

Game Texture Pack:Free Space Runner Pack by MattWalkden (itch.io)
